name: What'sThatSong
0:
”Alexa, open playlist trivia”
”Alexa, start playlist trivia and switch playlist”
”Alexa, ask playlist trivia to start a new game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: playlist trivia
des:
Thinking about putting your music knowledge to the test?

What's that Song is a trivia game that tests your knowledge of music in playlists. During the game, you will hear a 30 second song sample and you'll have the opportunity to guess the song's title and artist. By default, you will have access to a variety of premade playlists, all of which are listed below, or by asking "Alexa, what are the available playlists?" If you have a Spotify account, you can gain access to additional playlists by linking your Spotify account to What's that Song. You may switch to any available playlist by saying "Alexa, switch playlist".

To get started, say "Alexa, open playlist trivia".

The scoring works as follows:
- 3 points for the correct song name
- 2 points for the correct artist name

Premade Playlists:
- DailyJams
- Today's Top Hits
- Pop Rising
- All Out 10s
- All Out 00s
- All Out 90s
- Classic Oldies
- Rap Caviar
- Film & TV Favorites

Special Thanks to Tomorrow Daily for putting together the DailyJams playlist. Tomorrow Daily is an indie rock band based out of Athens, OH.




This is a rerelease of the original What's that Song skill for Amazon Alexa, created by Austin Wilson.

A Spotify account is not required to play What's that Song.

NOTE: This skill is not endorsed, or sponsored, by Spotify AB.
